text:
"Ultimate Custom Night" is a point-and-click survival horror video game created by Scott Cawthon. It is the second official spin-off of the "Five Nights at Freddy's" game series, the first one being "FNaF World". The game was released on June 27, 2018 for free on Steam and Game Jolt.
The game allows the player to choose from 50 characters from all six main "Five Nights at Freddy's" games, as well from a spin-off, "FNaF World", and set their difficulty levels for the night from a minimum of '0' to a maximum of '20'.
